message:
OCR improvements (#214)

* Add sidebar displaying mode for per region textareas

* Fix label tree groups

* Fix tests

* Add tests and fixes

* Update styles

* Add rotating of label on rectangle

* Update entities header

* Fix tests

* Add eslint rules for codeceptjs

* Add constraints to applying labels

- preventing of applying region labels to semantically incompatible regions
- test

* Add textarea focusing by dblclick and fixs

* Hide duplicate text

* Clean

* Add autofocus textarea by selectAfterCreate setting

* Fix text selection in region item

* Fix autofocus on textarea for different shapes

* Fix label name computing

* Add submitting text when collapsing region item

* Fix tests

* Fix tests

* Fix focusing

* Add focus by enter instead of autofocus

* Add scrolling selected region item into view

* Fix tests

* Fix removing area under cursor

* Fix brush size at slider

* Add deserialization test on OCR mode

* Fix sidebar textarea styles

* Fix image rotating in two columns template

* Fix tests

Co-authored-by: Koshevarov Sergey <Gondragos@gmail.com>
